== Files Included

=== TAR Format

* `tar/basic.tar` - Standard TAR archive
* `tar/gnu_sparse.tar` - GNU sparse file
* `tar/pax_format.tar` - PAX extended format
* `tar/with_links.tar` - Symbolic and hard links
* `tar/longnames.tar` - Long filename handling

=== CPIO Format

* `cpio/newc.cpio` - New ASCII format (SVR4)
* `cpio/crc.cpio` - CRC format
* `cpio/odc.cpio` - Old portable format
* `cpio/binary.cpio` - Binary format

=== ISO Format

* `iso/basic.iso` - Basic ISO 9660
* `iso/rockridge.iso` - Rock Ridge extensions
* `iso/joliet.iso` - Joliet long filenames
* `iso/udf.iso` - UDF filesystem

=== RAR Format

* `rar/basic_rar3.rar` - RAR version 3 archive
* `rar/basic_rar5.rar` - RAR version 5 archive

== Usage in Omnizip

These fixtures ensure Omnizip maintains compatibility with standard
archive formats as implemented by libarchive, a widely-used library
that serves as the reference implementation for many formats.

== Modifications

None. These are standard test archives from the libarchive test suite
or generated using libarchive tools.
